typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	batchSize: 2,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '',
	format: 'query') ~> Product
source(output(
		pad_id as integer,
		pr_code as string,
		pad_name as string,
		pad_value as string,
		AuditUserId as integer,
		AuditRecCreateTS as timestamp,
		AuditRecUpdateTS as timestamp,
		AuditType as integer,
		AuditServiceFlag as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductAddData
Product, ProductAddData join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MortgageType
